accessory_description:
※ Split-play is supported only in TV mode and requires one Joy-Con™ 2 per player.
※ This is not the “Share Play” feature available on Nintendo Switch™ 2.
catch_copy:
The super popular "Run for Money" game is coming to Nintendo Switch™ 2 !
Experience your very own "Run for Money"!!
description:
The hit Japanese game show “Run for Money” is coming to Nintendo Switch™ 2!
The game retains the show’s signature runner mechanics, and for the first time in the series, this edition  introduces the all-new “Hunter Mode”!
Not only can you play as a runner escaping from hunters, you can also become a hunter and capture the runners!
This edition features five original stages: “Wonderland,” “Airport,” “Harbor,” “Fantasy,” and “Diver City.”
Just like in the TV show, runners will face a variety of missions during each stage!
Clear all the mission and aim to make a successful escape!!
This latest edition also brings enhanced multiplayer features!
All 5 original stages are available for local and online multiplayer matches!
In online battles, the new "Hunter VS Runaway Mode" lets up to 12 players (4 Hunters, 8 Runaways) face off!
Let's all have a blast playing Run for Money!

<Features of the Nintendo Switch™ 2>
The Nintendo Switch™ 2 features enhanced maximum resolution for even more stunning visuals!
"In Handheld Mode, resolution improves from HD to Full HD (1920x1080).
In TV Mode, enjoy up to 4K (3840x2160) resolution."

"This title is playable only on Nintendo Switch™ 2.
Please note: This is a different product from ""Run for Money: Hunter vs. Runner!

Which side will you win!?"" previously released for Nintendo Switch™."

Save data and additional content from previous versions are not compatible with this version.
Be sure to avoid accidental or duplicate purchases.
formal_name: "Run for Money": Hunter VS Runner! Which Side Will You Win!?
network_feature_description:
This software supports the following:
- Touch screen
player_number_description:
●“Hunter vs. Fugitive Mode” can be played solo by connecting online.
●Matching via Internet communication requires two or more players.
strong_disclaimer:
This title is playable only on Nintendo Switch™ 2.
Please note: This is a different product from "Run for Money: Hunter vs. Runner!
Which side will you win!?" previously released for Nintendo Switch™.

Save data and additional content from previous versions are not compatible with this version.
Be sure to avoid accidental or duplicate purchases.
